screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .pspframe file in Corel PaintShop Pro 2023
screenshot.caption: PSPFRAME file open in Corel PaintShop Pro 2023

description: PaintShop Pro is a raster image editor that comes with various tools to create graphics and edit digital photos, including camera raw images. The picture frame tool allows you to add a digital frame around an image to direct the focus of the viewer's perspective.
PaintShop Pro comes with pre-made picture frames saved as PSPFRAME files in the following directory:
You can also create custom picture frames and save them as PSPFRAME files by selecting File → Save As... .

images.caption: PSPFRAME file open in Corel PaintShop Pro 2023
